variable.name: SITES OF DISEASE
variable.description: Metastatic disease sites [BR=breast; CNS=brain; BN=bone; L=lung; A=adrenal; CT=cutaneous; PL=pleura; PC=pericardium; N=nodes; H=liver]

variable.name: DRUG TREATMENTS
variable.comment: [DOC=docetaxel; DOX=doxorubicin; DOX-L= doxorubicin liposomal; CTX=cyclophosphamide; PAC=paclitaxel; NAV=navelbine; GEM=gemcitabine; EPI=epirubicin; 5FU=5-Fluorouracil; NAB-P=nab-paxlitaxel; CP=carboplatin; CAP=capecitabine; IXA=ixabepilone; LAP-lapatinib; HER=trastuzumab; BEV=bevacizumab; FAS=fulvestrant; GOS=goserelin; TAM=tamoxifen; EXM=exemestane; ANA=anastrozole; LET=letrozole; CCI-779=temsirolomus; EST=estradiol; MEG=megace; MET=methotrexate; PI3K-INH=PI3 Kinase inhibitor phase I trial; NER=neratinib; RAL=raloxifene; ERI =eribulin; CIS=cisplatin; PAT=patupilone; EVR=everolimus; GSO=graft sample obtained]

variable.name: FAMILY HISTORY: BREAST, OVARIAN
variable.description: Relatives diagnosed with breast or ovarian cancer
